医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
III 期试验表明脑转移治疗中存在可逆的认知副作用根据三项大型 III 期临床试验的汇总分析，大量在放射治疗后出现认知副作用的脑转移患者可能会完全恢复认知功能。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240929/Phase-III-trials-indicate-reversible-cognitive-side-effects-in-brain-metastases-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240929/Phase-III-trials-indicate-reversible-cognitive-side-effects-in-brain-metastases-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f51cb97c-c762-4528-8522-f38e22108600 Sun, 29 Sep 2024 22:44:39 -0400 Phase III trials indicate reversible cognitive side effects in brain metastases treatment
通过创新的放射性药物治疗延长脑膜瘤患者的生存期一种放射性药物疗法已成功延长了神经内分泌肿瘤患者的无进展生存期，该疗法有望为难以治疗的脑膜瘤（一种脑肿瘤）患者带来类似的益处。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240929/Extending-survival-in-meningioma-患者-with-innovative-radiopharmaceutical-therapy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240929/Extending-survival-in-meningioma-患者-with-innovative-radiopharmaceutical-therapy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b2072aa0-c2dc-42f9-b468-b7e6166c0566 Sun, 29 Sep 2024 22:38:27 -0400 Extending survival in meningioma patients with innovative radiopharmaceutical therapy
谷胱甘肽可显着降低乙醛水平并有助于缓解宿醉研究表明，谷胱甘肽（GSH）可显着降低乙醛水平，而乙醛水平是宿醉的一个关键因素，尽管主观症状在各组之间几乎没有差异。药代动力学数据表明，谷胱甘肽可加速乙醛清除，可能缓解宿醉症状。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240929/Glutathione-found-to-significantly-reduce-acetogenic-levels-and-help-relieve-hangovers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240929/Glutathione-found-to-significantly-reduce-acetogenic-levels-and-help-relieve-hangovers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ff95e9d2-4386-4dcf-9b0b-054a3e8fd4f1 Sun, 29 Sep 2024 22:36:00 -0400 Glutathione found to significantly reduce acetaldehyde levels and help relieve hangovers
探索趋化因子在心房颤动发展中的作用宣布在《心血管创新与应用》杂志上发表新文章。趋化因子是细胞因子的一个亚类，是一大类小型分泌蛋白，通过细胞表面上 G 蛋白偶联的七螺旋趋化因子受体进行通讯。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240929/Exploring-the-role-of-chemokines-in-atrial-fibrillation-development.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240929/Exploring-the-role-of-chemokines-in-atrial-fibrillation-development.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=63abced0-f046-4691-b308-1565075be626 Sun, 29 Sep 2024 22:33:00 -0400 Exploring the role of chemokines in atrial fibrillation development
Brusatol 可能作为胰腺导管腺癌的潜在辅助治疗宣布在《药物学报》杂志上发表新文章。吉西他滨 (Gem) 的化疗耐药性仍然是治疗胰腺导管腺癌 (PDAC) 的一个重大障碍。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240929/Brusatol-may-serve-as-pottial-adjuvant-therapy-for-pancreatic-ductal-adenocarcinoma.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240929/Brusatol-may-serve-as-pottial-adjuvant-therapy-for-pancreatic-ductal-adenocarcinoma.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b619ecee-4507-403f-97a4-7dccc52eb11e Sun, 29 Sep 2024 22:10:00 -0400 Brusatol may serve as potential adjuvant therapy for pancreatic ductal adenocarcinoma
通过共同阅读促进幼儿大脑发育美国儿科学会鼓励父母和看护者与新生儿和幼儿一起大声朗读，以此作为在大脑发育关键时期培养关爱和培育关系的机会，并建议儿科医生在儿童健康探访时为家庭提供指导和书籍支持，根据更新的政策声明。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240929/Nurturing-brain-development-in-young-children-through-shared-reading.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240929/Nurturing-brain-development-in-young-children-through-shared-reading.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1a90e548-5cfe-4a7c-b235-ca66c0cedba0 Sun, 29 Sep 2024 22:05:08 -0400 Nurturing brain development in young children through shared reading
健康素养差距助长了初级保健患者对抗生素不切实际的期望研究表明，超过 93% 的初级保健患者希望使用抗生素来治疗常见症状，尤其是在公立诊所，而缺乏教育和健康素养导致了这些不切实际的期望。对抗生素风险的了解是影响患者需求的关键因素。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240929/Health-literacy-gaps-fuel-unrealistic-antibiotic-expectations-in-primary-care-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240929/Health-literacy-gaps-fuel-unrealistic-antibiotic-expectations-in-primary-care-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0f1798f2-32ac-4d10-b755-c686f85ba6f8 Sun, 29 Sep 2024 20:07:00 -0400 Health literacy gaps fuel unrealistic antibiotic expectations in primary care patients
饮食和肠道菌群失调与类风湿性关节炎有关综述强调了肠道菌群失调和饮食因素如何与类风湿性关节炎相关，影响疾病进展和炎症。研究人员探索特定饮食如何帮助调节肠道微生物组以改善症状。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240929/Diet-and-gut-dysbiosis-linked-to-rheumatoid-arthritis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240929/Diet-and-gut-dysbiosis-linked-to-rheumatoid-arthritis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c500404f-024e-4f45-9f24-677376468059 Sun, 29 Sep 2024 19:59:00 -0400 Diet and gut dysbiosis linked to rheumatoid arthritis
针对下呼吸道感染的新型呼吸测试显示在重症监护环境中灵敏度为 100%研究人员开发了一种基于呼吸的体外检测方法，通过测量中性粒细胞弹性蛋白酶活性来准确检测下呼吸道感染（LRTI）。这种非侵入性测试具有很高的诊断灵敏度，可能会彻底改变 LRTI 检测。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240929/New-breath-based-test-for-lower-respiratory-tract-infections-shows-10025-sensitivity-in-ritic-care-settings.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240929/New-breath-based-test-for-lower-respiratory-tract-infections-shows-10025-sensitivity-in-ritic-care-settings.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=07c97c66-5299-4a9b-b6f4-79251ac338bf Sun, 29 Sep 2024 19:41:00 -0400 New breath-based test for lower respiratory tract infections shows 100% sensitivity in critical care settings
从患者到医生：EJ Beck 在 NYU Langone Health 的医疗之旅EJ Beck 小时候在纽约大学兰格尼健康中心接受了一种罕见的儿童甲状腺癌的治疗。大约 10 年后，贝克的扫描结果宣布她已痊愈，她被一所医学院录取为她的第一选择：纽约大学格罗斯曼医学院。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240927/From-病人到医生-EJ-Becks-medical-journey-at-NYU-Langone-Health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240927/From-病人到医生-EJ-Becks-medical-journey-at-NYU-Langone-Health.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7cd29ed9-16ed-4f31-9597-983cefb2801a Fri, 27 Sep 2024 23:11:00 -0400 From patient to physician: EJ Beck's medical journey at NYU Langone Health
